title: 05/24/2021 - HOUR 1 - Lakers, Knicks, Clippers

description:
Anthony Davis had a bad game but the Lakers should still win the series

Knicks-Hawks should be a long series

Colin gives his thoughts on the issues with the Clippers


Guest: Chris Broussard
